name: Balloonie (Starpak)
description:
You take the role of a balloon that was left by his owner.
The scope of the game is to evade from the clouds, because it will rain soon and you do not want to be caught flat-footed. If you take the bubble, you will be able to jump higher. Do not touch the spikes and avoid the bullets.
  • A / Left arrow: Move left
  • D / Right arrow: Move right
  • Space: Jump

I am waiting for suggestions/impressions in the comment section. What should I add or what should I change? I am still a begginer, it's my first project finished in Unity so stay tunned!!

P.S: Also, comment if you see a bug.

Have fun!!
